item.title: Galkons Re-factored client one simple error
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

client.java:12397: expected
tabHPos = -1;
^
How to fix? Solved

Now i have another error how to fix this?

client.java:12394: missing method body, or declare abstract private client(); ^ client.java:12427: illegal forward reference playerArray = new Player[maxPlayers]; ^ client.java:12428: illegal forward reference playerIndices = new int[maxPlayers]; ^ client.java:12429: illegal forward reference anIntArray894 = new int[maxPlayers]; ^ client.java:12430: illegal forward reference aStreamArray895s = new Stream[maxPlayers]; ^ client.java:12459: illegal forward reference anIntArray976 = new int[anInt975]; ^ client.java:12460: illegal forward reference anIntArray977 = new int[anInt975]; ^ client.java:12461: illegal forward reference anIntArray978 = new int[anInt975]; ^ client.java:12462: illegal forward reference anIntArray979 = new int[anInt975]; ^ client.java:12463: illegal forward reference anIntArray980 = new int[anInt975]; ^ client.java:12464: illegal forward reference anIntArray981 = new int[anInt975]; ^ client.java:12465: illegal forward reference anIntArray982 = new int[anInt975]; ^ client.java:12466: illegal forward reference aStringArray983 = new String[anInt975]; ^
